workspaces.title: Workspaces and Applications — $t(common:main.title)
workspaces.description: Create new Workspaces and new Apps, edit them, and run them

workspace.title: "{{name}}" Workspace — $t(common:main.title)
workspace.empty: <button>Créez votre première automatisation</button> pour voir votre espace de travail s'animer

confirm.title: Do you want to delete the "{{name}}" workspace?
confirm.content: Warning, the data will be lost.

create.description_first: Create your first workspace to start automating your work
create.label: Create a workspace

automations.empty: An automation describes what to do and when to do it

confirm.title: Do you want to delete the "{{name}}" automation?
confirm.content: Warning, the data will be lost.

events.title: Events
events.help: Automation will be run everytime one of this event will be fired.

dates.title: Dates
dates._help: Automation will be run at every specified date interval.

endpoint.title: URL
endpoint.copied: URL has been copied in your clipboard
endpoint.help: Automation will be run everytime the URL will be hit.
endpoint.custom: Execute this automation by calling a web address

instruction.label: {{context}}
instruction.description_emit: Issue an event of your choice to which you can associate a data object. If you choose to make this event private, it will not be heard by other workspaces and Apps.
instruction.description_repeat: Repeats a list of instructions on each element of a data array passed in parameter (`on`) or up to a certain number of iterations (`until`).
instruction.description_all: Executes all the instructions of the group in parallel. The following instructions will be executed only after all the instructions of this group are finished.
instruction.description_wait: Blocks the processing of the instruction list until the event passed in parameter is triggered.
instruction.description_set: Sets a value in a variable.
instruction.description_conditions: Test conditions in order to execute this or that group of instructions.

apps.uninstall: Are you sure you want to remove {{appName}} from your workspace ?
apps.title: Apps Store

confirm.slugInvalid: Only allowed characters are letters, numbers, whitespaces, . _ and -
confirm.title: Publish the workspace as an app
confirm.content:
The workspace's automations, pages, widget and config will be accessible to anyone who install your app.
Remove any private API key you want to keep private first.

pages.empty: Interfaces according to needs and roles

confirm.title: Do you want to delete the page "{{name}}"?
confirm.content: Warning, the data will be lost.

widgets.empty: No widgets are available in this workspace. Install an App!

share.label: Share access to the page
share.access_private: Choose which users can view your page
share.copy: Copy the public address of the page
share.copied: The address is copied into your clipboard

exit.confirm_message: You are about to leave without saving. Are you sure?

save.fail: Your workspace is invalid and could not be saved.

404: This workspace does not exist. Return to your home page.
